# f5xc_user_identification (Data Source)

Fetches information about an existing User Identification in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the User Identification to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the User Identification exists.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the User Identification.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the User Identification.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to the User Identification.
